description:
If a tag file has a variable directive that has a "name-from-attribute" as an
attribute ,a translation time exception thrown.
Here is the tag file:
=============


<%@tag dynamic-attributes="false" import="java.io.*" isScriptingEnabled="true" %>

<%@attribute name="id" required="true" rtexprvalue="false" %>
<%@attribute name="frag1" fragment="true" required="true"  %>
<%@variable name-from-attribute="url" scope="AT_BEGIN" %>
<jsp:invoke fragment="frag1"/>
<jsp:doBody/>



=============

Variable directive: Invalid attribute, name-from-attribute
